title: Poster, "Signs that say safe driving...", ca. 1966
signed: Signature imprinted in gray ink, lower right quadrant: Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink, lower right quadrant: Signs that say Safe Driving...
description: Different street signs spread out on page in varied colors: red, black, yellow, white and blue. Signs include a hollow red triangle with a young girl and boy holding hands imprinted in black inside triangle, a hollow red circle, a yellow circle with a black diagonal line through it, and a blue circle with 2 white connected arrows (straight and right) inside it.  The signs include a Ford logo (pill shaped) in blue and white to left of center. Title imprinted in black, lower right quadrant.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Signs that say safe driving...", ca. 1966.
ca. 1966. Offset lithograph on white paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-9.
